remarks: A bijection useful for converting statements about open sets to statements about closed sets and vice versa.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 27-Aug-2009.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 1-Sep-2015.)

$d F x $.
$d J u x $.
